#summary PTF Tools: SDBToken generates a token to be used with the Skydrive, Dropbox and Google Drive sensors.
#sidebar PTF_Sidebar

http://ptf-prtgaddons.googlecode.com/files/SDBTokenLogo.png

= Introduction =

The Skydrive, Dropbox and Google Drive sensors require a security token to be able to collect usage data from your account.

= Details =

The Skydrive, Dropbox and Google Drive sensors require a security token to be able to collect usage data from your account. This tool provides you with the steps to take to obtain this security token.

http://ptf-prtgaddons.googlecode.com/files/SDBToken.png

The obtained token needs to be entered in the sensors parameter section.
{{{
-t=1g0ilwy1232dx8jlqik1123jdjzsjm
}}}

Tokens are uniqueue for every sensor type and account that needs to be monitorred.

http://ptf-prtgaddons.googlecode.com/files/SDBSensors.png


The Skydrive, Dropbox and Google Drive sensors can be downloaded from [http://code.google.com/p/prtg-addons/wiki/PTF_Tools_VersionHistory this] page.

The tool can be downloaded [http://code.google.com/p/prtg-addons/wiki/PTF_Tools_VersionHistory here]
